data.title: Claire Bloom
data.text:
AKA Patricia Claire Blume

Born: 15-Feb-1931

Birthplace: London, England

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: England

Executive summary: Crimes and Misdemeanors

Stage and screen actress.

Father: Edward Bloom

Mother: Elizabeth Grew

Husband: Rod Steiger (actor, m. 1959, div. 1969)

Husband: Hillard Elkins (film industry, m. 1969, div. 1979)

Husband: Philip Roth (novelist, m. 19-Apr-1990, separated 1994, div. 1995)
